channel.title: Twitter / jmchilton
channel.description: Twitter updates from John Chilton / jmchilton.

item.title: jmchilton: Anyone else just totally not understand any of this marketing for Mel Gibson's new movie?
item.description: jmchilton: Anyone else just totally not understand any of this marketing for Mel Gibson's new movie?

item.title: jmchilton: Alyssa - pregnant, drinking, and driving. #FML http://twitgoo.com/1972np
item.description: jmchilton: Alyssa - pregnant, drinking, and driving. #FML http://twitgoo.com/1972np

item.title: jmchilton: "Seriously? Seriously, you want to go there NOT doctor?" -Alyssa
item.description: jmchilton: "Seriously? Seriously, you want to go there NOT doctor?" -Alyssa

item.title: jmchilton: Christmas creep has begun
item.description: jmchilton: Christmas creep has begun

item.title: jmchilton: Alyssa would have made me make hash browns, without her here I got to make my preferred meal - olive oil garnished with shredded potatoes.
item.description: jmchilton: Alyssa would have made me make hash browns, without her here I got to make my preferred meal - olive oil garnished with shredded potatoes.

item.title: jmchilton: Oddly we have never been able to get Pickles to eat anything but dry cat food. Tonight I found the exception - Pizza Rolls.
item.description: jmchilton: Oddly we have never been able to get Pickles to eat anything but dry cat food. Tonight I found the exception - Pizza Rolls.

item.title: jmchilton: @philcrissman Learned many useless things as a math minor e.g. def gcd(a, b) b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b) end def rp(a, b) gcd(a, b) == 1 end
item.description: jmchilton: @philcrissman Learned many useless things as a math minor e.g. def gcd(a, b) b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b) end def rp(a, b) gcd(a, b) == 1 end

item.title: jmchilton: RT @philcrissman: A blog post about small, fun code problems; today: relatively prime integers. http://philcrissman.com/2010/07/07/relat ...
item.description: jmchilton: RT @philcrissman: A blog post about small, fun code problems; today: relatively prime integers. http://philcrissman.com/2010/07/07/relat ...

item.title: jmchilton: RT @lxforever: This is super nerdy, but I can't resist. http://apps.usa.gov/ I foresee a new screen on my phone devoted entirely to gov' ...
item.description: jmchilton: RT @lxforever: This is super nerdy, but I can't resist. http://apps.usa.gov/ I foresee a new screen on my phone devoted entirely to gov' ...

item.title: jmchilton: It's not like if Alyssa were in the country she would have made me breakfast, but nonetheless I wouldn't had ice cream from the tub. Odd.
item.description: jmchilton: It's not like if Alyssa were in the country she would have made me breakfast, but nonetheless I wouldn't had ice cream from the tub. Odd.

item.title: jmchilton: @Ry4an 2 reasons - Existing implementation was in Scheme and I develop static, compiled webapps 40+ hours a week for my day job. #Lisps4Life
item.description: jmchilton: @Ry4an 2 reasons - Existing implementation was in Scheme and I develop static, compiled webapps 40+ hours a week for my day job. #Lisps4Life

item.title: jmchilton: Spent the weekend reimplementing my website in clojure, now it looks like my godaddy host can't keep up with the memory demands. Sad day.
item.description: jmchilton: Spent the weekend reimplementing my website in clojure, now it looks like my godaddy host can't keep up with the memory demands. Sad day.

item.title: jmchilton: The greatest programming book ever written is now available in an epub format for nerds on the go. http://github.com/ieure/sicp/downloads
item.description: jmchilton: The greatest programming book ever written is now available in an epub format for nerds on the go. http://github.com/ieure/sicp/downloads

item.title: jmchilton: Changed Pickle's litter, went for a run, went grocery shopping, worked on my web site rewrite. Its been a very productive Saturday morning.
item.description: jmchilton: Changed Pickle's litter, went for a run, went grocery shopping, worked on my web site rewrite. Its been a very productive Saturday morning.

item.title: jmchilton: I am the only person in the world that wishes Twitter allowed you to save and update drafts, right?
item.description: jmchilton: I am the only person in the world that wishes Twitter allowed you to save and update drafts, right?

item.title: jmchilton: I just noticed my shirt is all stained. Apparently there are down sides to grilling turkey cheddar brats for breakfast.
item.description: jmchilton: I just noticed my shirt is all stained. Apparently there are down sides to grilling turkey cheddar brats for breakfast.

item.title: jmchilton: The Last Airbender has a 6% at Rotten Tomatoes. That is rough, how can it have half the score of Killers. It looked so awesome.
item.description: jmchilton: The Last Airbender has a 6% at Rotten Tomatoes. That is rough, how can it have half the score of Killers. It looked so awesome.
